title: How do I select the storage location for contacts?
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, select **Phone contact** or **SIM contact** above the contact photo in the new contact page to set the default storage location for the contact.

For EMUI 3.0, select **New Phone contact** or **New SIM contact** above the contact photo in the new contact page to set the default storage location for the contact.
